actions.name: Pendulum
actions.description: Effect:Each time the user resolves the same specific attack between consecutive Activations, that attack's Power increased by 20%, up to a max increase of 100%. This boost from Pendulum resets if the user is switched out, @Affliction[fainted], combat ends, or the user declares a different attack.

system.description: Effect: While slotted, the user maintains a Pendulum Clock, 6 Spans in size. Each time the user resolves the same specific attack between consecutive Activations, tick the Clock 1 Span. For each each filled Span on the Clock, that attack's Power increased by 20%, up to a max increase of 100%. This boost this Ability gives resets if the user is switched out, @Affliction[fainted], combat ends, or the user declares a different attack.
